seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Fashion & Apparel Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Fashion-conscious shoppers expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 482 Shopify fashion & apparel stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 51, Top 10%: 69. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for fashion stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Fashion & Apparel store scores 49 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 69+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 39 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
Some stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 482 Shopify fashion & apparel stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Fashion & Apparel Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 482 Shopify stores in the fashion and apparel industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for fashion & apparel stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Fashion ecommerce is intensely competitive, with shoppers comparing multiple stores before purchasing. A faster store creates a perception of professionalism and reliability that fashion-conscious buyers value.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify fashion & apparel stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 482 Shopify fashion & apparel stores, the median pagespeed score is 51. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 69. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my fashion & apparel store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other fashion & apparel stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 51 (the median), you're in the top half of fashion & apparel stores. If you're better than 69, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
